text: The Vanuatu women's national basketball team is the basketball side that represents Vanuatu in international competitions. It is administered by the Vanuatu Amateur Basketball Federation.Profile - Vanuatu, FIBA.com, Retrieved 3 July 2016. The team appeared at the 1981 Oceania Basketball Tournament for Women and the 2011 Pacific Games. ==References== ==External links== *Vanuatu Basketball, News, Teams, Scores, ... title: Vanuatu women's national basketball team
